Package org.kynosarges.tektosyne.demo

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kynosarges.tektosyne.demo.Global

  • public final class Global
extends Object
    Provides global resources and helpers for the application.
    Version:
    6.1.0
    Author:
    Christoph Nahr

    • Field Detail

      • RANDOM

        public static final ThreadLocalRandom RANDOM
        The random number generator for the application. Shared instance for use by various test dialogs.

    • Method Detail

      • primaryStage

        public static Stage primaryStage​()
        Gets the primary Stage of the application.
        Returns:
        the primary Stage of the application

      • addTooltip

        public static void addTooltip​(Control control,
                              String text)
        Adds the specified String to the existing Tooltip of the specified Control, if any.
        Parameters:
        control - the Control whose Tooltip to set
        text - the String to show in the Tooltip
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if control if null

      • clipChildren

        public static void clipChildren​(Region region)
        Clips the children of the specified Region to its current size. This requires attaching a change listener to the region’s layout bounds, as JavaFX does not currently provide any built-in way to clip children.
        Parameters:
        region - the Region whose children to clip
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if region is null

      • boldFont

        public static Font boldFont​(double size)
        Gets a bold Font using the default family and specified size.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the Font, in points
        Returns:
        a bold Font using the default family and specified size

      • copy

        public static <T> void copy​(Window owner,
                            Class<T> type,
                            T[] items)
        Copies the specified array of geometric objects to the system clipboard. Copies items as a sequence of Double values that represent the coordinates of all specified geometric objects. Does nothing if items is null or empty. Shows an Alert for any other error or exception. Never throws exceptions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the geometric type to convert from, which must be either LineD, PointD, RectD, or SizeD
        Parameters:
        owner - the Window that owns any Alert that appears
        type - the Class object for T, required for method dispatch
        items - the T array to copy

      • fontSize

        public static double fontSize​()
        Gets the default Font size for the application.
        Returns:
        the default Font size for the application

      • paste

        public static <T> T[] paste​(Window owner,
                            Class<T> type)
        Attempts to paste an array of geometric objects from the system clipboard. Expects a String on the clipboard that contains a sequence of Double values which represent coordinates for instances of the specified geometric type. Shows an Alert for any other error or exception. Never throws exceptions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the geometric type to convert to, which must be either LineD, PointD, RectD, or SizeD
        Parameters:
        owner - the Window that owns any Alert that appears
        type - the Class object for T, required for method dispatch
        Returns:
        a T array copied from the clipboard, or null if none was available or an error occurred

      • showError

        public static void showError​(Window owner,
                             String header,
                             String content)
        Shows a modal Alert with the specified error message.
        Parameters:
        owner - the Window that owns the Alert
        header - the header text of the Alert
        content - the content text of the Alert

      • showError

        public static void showError​(Window owner,
                             String header,
                             Throwable e)
        Shows a modal Alert with the specified Throwable.
        Parameters:
        owner - the Window that owns the Alert
        header - the header text of the Alert
        e - the Throwable providing content for the Alert
